DataElement.preferredName: Primary Death Reason Other Specify Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The free text field that describes another response when other is chosen from the categorical primary cause of death.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Occurring first in time or sequence; original; of greatest rank or importance or value._The circumstance or condition that results in the death of a living being._An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The free text field that describes another response when other is chosen from a list of values.
